cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.21.0)

configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2.a" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2.a COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2.a" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2.dll.a COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2.la" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2.la COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2_test.a" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2_test.a COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2_test.la" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2_test.la COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2_test.a" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2_test.a COPYONLY)
configure_file("SDL2/libSDL2_test.la" ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/external/sdl2/libSDL2_test.la COPYONLY)
